info.name: MoiPayWay API
info.description:
MoiPayWay API enables you to build any payment related application such as marketplace, loan, saving & investment system, subscription system, payment checkout, payroll and so much more.

Variable: baseURL - Value: https://api.moipayway.com

Variable: token - Value: Token gotten from Authentication

Variable: merchant_id - Value: Merchant Unique ID


If you face any challenges don't hesitate to contact us at hello@moipayway.com

request.description:
To access this endpoint a order request must be initiated to get the 'order_reference_code' 

using the product_type_id '83' for BVN request

using the product_type_id '427' for NIN request

Numbers of time beneficiary would pay in a given validity.

E.g. If rounds is 1, its means the beneficiary pays once in a week or in a month
